scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of records of the Abraham Lincoln Brigade Archives (ALBA), an organization of supporters of the U.S. veterans of the Spanish Civil War, mostly dating from the 1980s and 1990s. It includes administrative files, financial and fundraising records and correspondence originating in ALBA's the New York and San Francisco offices and files relating to ALBA's African-American Veterans Project. Boxes 15 and 16 contain catalogs for ALBA's poster exhibit, "Shouts from the Wall," and Box 18 contains Executive Director Marvin Gettleman's editorial files relating to a special issue of Science and Society (Fall 2004) honoring Lincoln Briagde veteran Robert Colodny.
